WorkItem.ClosedComment: Duplicate to Buff Groups Request, which is active
WorkItem.Description: I would like to make a suggestion to "Enable all non-profession specific enchants" or "Enable all current enchants" by default or by a menu choice.  When I load from the Character Profiler and I want to run the optimizer, I have to go through and manually select every (top) enchant by slot.  If I have the Arcanum of the Stalwart Protector on my current shoulders, Rawr should automatically make that available to optimize for all possible upgrades (assuming I select override enchants.)  Another solution would be so save a Default Enchants list so that I could load them like I do with a Gemming Template.  Thanks for the attention and all the hard work.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.LoadCharacter] Auto-Check Enchants from CharProfiler/Armory Imports

Comments.Message: Addtionally: I know I can save enchants by saving the character file, but if I reload from the Character Profiler or Armory, I have to reselect enchants.  I'm trying to avoid this.
